meta_description: PyCon Odessa - Python-focused conference, which will be held in Odessa, March 16, 2019.
heading_count_finish: Until the end of the action left
heading_count_rules_3_1: And get a promo code for a discount
about_banner_1: A Python community gathering we missed so much.
about_txt_1: PyCon Odessa - Python-focused conference, which will be held in Odessa, March 16, 2019.
about_txt_2: It’s place where our participants can share their experiences, get answers to your questions, and spend time in a company of likeminded people.
about_list_3: Participation in all contests at the conference
diversity_text_2: Please fill in the form with all information about yourself
history_txt: The first Python Conference in Odessa - OdessaPy - was held in December 2013. It was attended by more than 75 guests from Ukraine, Russian Federation, and Moldova. The event program was quite saturated and covered various Python programming aspects.
speakers_descr: Currently, we are working on a conference program, meet the first speakers 👇
schedule_txt: The conference program will be available two weeks before the event
sponsors_txt_1:
All additional questions and conditions of partnership can be discussed individually.
Your support is important to us.
sponsors_txt_2: We’re looking forward to create a custom offer for you and find the best possible way to connect you with our audience!
sponsor_1_text: The mission of the Python Software Foundation is to promote, protect, and advance the Python programming language, and to support and facilitate the growth of a diverse and international community of Python programmers.
accomodation_text_1: Discount for accommodation in the hotel “Geneva Resort Hotel” - 5%
accomodation_text_2: Discount for accommodation in the hotel “Ark Palace Hotel” - 15%
accomodation_text: Participants of the conference will be able to get a discount on hotel accommodation, using the promo code "PyCon Odessa"
footer_address: Odeska obl., Nova Dofinivka, 3 Vostochna str., Shantambala Retreat & Resort
about_txt_1_2020:
PyCon Odessa is an unique opportunity to immerse into a professional environment.

The proper atmosphere, useful contacts, and sea air - a fortunate combination of the upcoming PyCon Odessa 2021.
about_txt_1_2020-short:
is an unique opportunity to immerse into a professional environment.

The proper atmosphere, useful contacts, and sea air - a fortunate combination of the upcoming PyCon Odessa 2021.
about_txt_2_2020: We are preparing a conference program.
fill_yourself_form: Fill out the form with the info about yourself,
we_ll_call_you: We will consider the application and will contact you soon.
sponsors_text_1_new: Additional questions and partnership terms may be discussed individually.
sponsors_text_2_new: Your support is important to us!
sales: Participation in all draws at the conference
access_to_video: Access to video recordings of talks
first_day_descr: One track of talks focused on Python
second_day_descr: One track of talks focused on soft skills
quarantine: ** in compliance with all quarantine standards
transfer_text_1: Two buses will be used for the conference participants during two days.
transfer_text_2: You can already see the preliminary time of transfer in the schedule. But we want to make transfer as convenient as possible for everyone, taking into account the arrival and departure of guests from other cities of Ukraine.
transfer_text_3: We're asking conference participants to vote in the form below for the desired transfer time. We will try to find the best time for everyone.
transfer_text_4: Buses will pick up the participants from the Odessa railway station.
cinema_text_1: We will have an interesting company, a cool location, a projector, popcorn - so why don't we organize an outdoor movie viewing?
cinema_text_2: Help us with the choice of films, and we will arrange the rest.
location_plan_text1: It is possible to rent trailer and bee houses for living.
covid_block: We take Covid19 seriously. As official regulations advise, the conference will be held outdoors and have a limited amount of people. All our participants will be either vaccinated or freshly tested.
yoga_text_1: Hatha yoga is the style that many people associate with the word "yoga" today. The main goal of a hatha yoga practice is the physical health of a person. I have been practising yoga for over 5 years.
yoga_text_2: In these workouts, there will be no potentially dangerous and traumatic positions. It's suitable for any level of physical fitness.
afterparty_text_1: We're waiting for all participants at the afterparty!
afterparty_text_4: We'll provide snacks, you must be in a good mood, and
